title: Animaps
description: A animated derivative project for Blitmap. One Blitmap, 2-6 colors, cycled through with 1 of 10 transitions at different speeds. For Tezos.
creator: Dalawho

title: $BLITBIT
description: BLITBIT is an ERC20 token created by community member 0xBB by fractionalizing https://fractional.art/vaults/0xA74c21d6d1F643F1346847Aa061Cc924A7D960Cc which was then airdropped to Blitmap holders on July 30, 2021
creator: 0xBB

title: $BLITSQUAD
description: BLITSQUAD was initially a PartyBid initiated by community member itzler on behalf of Variant Fund.
creator: itzler

title: 3-D Blitmap
description: Each NFT of this collection is a 3D representation of the corresponding Blitmap
creator: Hashmasker1

title: blit merge —force
description: We all know that when you "git push --force" your code things can get a little "chaotic"... but what happens if you merge two Blitmaps?
creator: Steve

title: Blitblox
description: Blitblox generates a three dimensional voxel version of the corresponding map. All 3D data is generated and stored on chain as a glTF.
creator: sayangel

title: Blitoadz
description: Blitoadz is a blitmap x CrypToadz derivative collection created under the terms of CC0 . 100% stored on-chain
creator: Focus Points, Clément, Georges

title: Blitpop
description: Onchain pop art Blitmap derivatives
creator: sammybauch

title: Blitmares
description: Eerie/unsettling takes on Blitmap originals
creator: mr.hammn

title: Blitnoun
description: Blitnoun takes the iconic Nouns glasses and puts them on a Blitmap!
creator: niftypins

title: Blitzzz
description: Choose the theme music for your Blitmap! Blitzzz are a fusion of Dreamloop NFTs and Blitmap NFTs
creator: schmackofant

title: Blockblit
description: BlockBlits envisions Blitmaps as classic children's blocks. Each piece contains 16 siblings and the original.
creator: NiftyPins

title: Bootleg Blitmap
description: Playful takes on Blitmap originals
creator: DRND

title: Burnmap
description: A blitmap derivative collection. Pixel Pyrography on raw wood log. Crafted in real and recorded on chain.
creator: Monsieur ...

title: CryptoTeddies
description: The NFT Teddy Bear Universe created by Blitmap artist Numo
creator: numo

title: Cube Dancers
description: A collision of Mocap and Blitmap originals
creator: CUBE_DANCERS

title: DOSMAPS
description: Blitmap derivative collection inspired by DOSPUNKS.
creator: PsychoKiller

title: Dripmaps
description: Dripmaps are derivatives of Blitmaps, illustrated in watercolour and inks. Each Dripmap is hand painted by Ticklish.
creator: Ticklish

title: Dripdreams
description: DripDreams are DeepDream fusions and elaborations on the Dripmap series, painted by Ticklish. Each DripDream is a breeding of two or more Dripmap paintings.
creator: Ticklish

title: Everything is Everything
description: The definitive bagel survey of New York City. 202 bagels reviewed across all five boroughs, with notes of distinction given to the best stores, spreads and bagels.
creator: varley

title: Fast Food Blits
description: Combining Blitmap originals with fast food apparel
creator: BEASTER

title: Flipblit
description: Flipblit is an animated derivative series based on Blitmap, Chain Runners and possibly some other projects.
creator: Siggi

title: Flipmap
description: A discovery of the missing 8,300 Blitmap compositions, flipped horizontally to make Flipmaps!
creator: when lambo?, Sara Sioux

title: IT'S THE GUY!
description: 1:1 hand-made editions of The Guy released in batches of 2 Made by original The Guy artist Spacedoctor.
creator: Spacedoctor

title: Little Blitmap
description: Little Blitmaps are cute 24x24 versions of Blitmaps.
creator: smlg

title: LogoDAO
description: LogoDAO is officially the first unofficial DAO for holders of Logo palette and composition Blitmaps in the Blitverse. Membership open to all Logo palette holders, visitors welcome.
creator: community founded

title: Lost City: Book of Dreams
description: Lost City: Book of Dreams is a collection of lost Atlantis siblings, recovered by 13 Astrocryptids and artist Ciel Noel.
creator: cielxnoel

title: Meta Blits
description: MetaBlits is a collection of derivative illustrations based on the Blitmaps.
creator: MystoMask

title: Metaani Blitmap
description: metaani is a project to imbue CryptoArt with a soul and turn it into an avatar.
creator: mogmogvrMisositaworks

title: Mooncat Blitmap Boutique
description: Combines Jupiter Night Moon with the Mooncat Universe for a 17 piece mint run
creator: 0xMummy

title: NANOBLITS
description: 100 blitmaps made 4x smaller
creator: yanis

title: NiftyPins NFT & Physical Pins
description: NiftyPins are virtualized NFT enamel pins on the blockchain that can be claimed in real life.
creator: NiftyPins

title: Ossan Blitmap
description: This is a NFT series of MANGA-style male art using Blitmap Public Domain, created by Izuru_Shinonome.
creator: Izuru_Shinonome

title: Pixel Sorting Blitmap
description: Pixel sorting is isolating the vertical & horizontal lines of pixels and then resorting their positions based on data. This is done using Processing which is free open software used to create generative art.
creator: pixelsortingnouns

title: SMASHBLIT
description: SMASHBLIT is a derivative art / variant card chase collection of mashed up remixes consisting of the OG #0-99 BLITMAP art pieces.
creator: SalamiAttack

title: Stitchdrips
description: StitchDrips is a derivative Blitmap project. Each StitchDrip is a cross-pollination of a Dripmap painting by Ticklish and a Stitchmap embroidery by Quetzalcoatlia. They are generated using DeepDream.
creator: Ticklish, Quetzalcoatlia

title: Stitchmaps
description: Hand-sewn Stitchmaps by female artist Quetzalcoatlia using coloured cotton thread on 100% cotton fabric.
creator: Quetzalcoatlia

title: The Shattering
description: In a Blitverse far, far away, the Blitnauts have lost the Great war with the Enemies. War-torn and defeated, the surviving Blitnauts have gathered at the Frigate Street Tavern to craft a plan. The Blitmaps must be saved.
creator: fishboy

title: Wonderblit
description: Meet Wonderblit, a wizard's Blitmap reinterpretation through enchanting. Blitmaps reimagined through the Pixray image generation system by @dribnet.
creator: Eichenkundiger
